Detailed Description

MGTextureImages defines the attributes of TextureImages.

Member Function Documentation

int MGTextureImages::compute_image_range ( const MGBox &  stbox,
int &  iTotal,
int &  jTotal,
int &  nwTotal,
int &  nhTotal,
int &  i,
int &  j,
int &  nwidth,
int &  nheight,
MGVector &  base 
) const

Given stbox, find which MGTextureImage this stbox belongs to.

Function's return value is: 0: stbox is outside all the MGTextureImage's. 1: stbox is inside from (*this)(i,j) to (*this)(i+nwidth-1, j+nheight-1). 2: stbox is inside from (*this)(i,j) to (*this)(i+nwidth-1, j+nheight-1) when the output base is subtracted from stbox. 3: a part of stbox is inside total_box and a part is outside total_box.

Parameters:
stbox Box of the target triangle.
jTotal id of the rectangle of this MGTextureImages.
nhTotal number of repitition of this MGTextureImages.
j id in the 1st MGTextureImages will be output.
nheight number of repitition of MGTextureImage in the 1st MGTextureImage. i,j, nwidth, nheight are valid only when return=1 or 2.
base Base(left, bottom) address of the (i,j) MGTextureImage.
